attributes.action: Rescind the appointment of Peter Mandelson to Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The appointment of Peter Mandelson as trade secretary is a slap in the face to the concept of democracy. No non-elected person should be in Government as they are not accountable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
